doc:
Danny Lockin https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Danny_Lockin 0 Daniel Joseph "Danny" Lockin (July 13, 1943 – August 21, 1977) was an American actor and dancer who appeared on stage, television, and film. He was best known for his portrayal of the character Barnaby Tucker in the 1969 film Hello, Dolly!. In August 1977, Lockin was stabbed over 100 times by a man he met in a Garden Grove, California bar. In September 1978, his killer was convicted of voluntary manslaughter and sentenced to a four-year prison term. Daniel_Joseph_"_Danny_"_Lockin ( July_13_,_1943 – August_21_,_1977 ) was an_American_actor and dancer who appeared on stage_,_television , and film . In September_1978 , his_killer was_convicted of voluntary_manslaughter and sentenced to a_four-year_prison_term .
